message: 'The better I get to know men, the more I find myself loving dogs.' Charles de Gaulle
'Why did the dog sit in the shade? Because he didn't want to be a hot dog!'
'Dogs do speak, but only to those who know how to listen.' Orhan Pamuk
'If your dog is fat, you aren’t getting enough exercise.'
'Every dog has his day, unless he loses his tail, then he has a weak-end.'
'The only creatures that are evolved enough to convey pure love are dogs and infants.' Johnny Depp
'My dog is half Pitbull, half Poodle. Not much of a guard dog, but a vicious gossip.'
'I think dogs are the most amazing creatures; they give unconditional love. For me, they are the role model for being alive.' Gilda Radner
'I named my dog “Five Miles” so I can tell people I walk Five Miles every day.'
'Dogs never bite me. Just humans.' Marilyn Monroe
'Why don’t blind people skydive? Because it scares the dog.'
'A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.' Josh Billings
'I wonder if other dogs think poodles are members of a weird religious cult.' Rita Rudner
'Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.' Roger Caras
'Why did the dog go to the doctor? Because he had a ruff day!'
'The more I see of men, the more I like dogs.' Madame de Staël
'When a man’s best friend is his dog, that dog has a problem.' Edward Abbey
'The bond with a true dog is as lasting as the ties of this earth will ever be.' Konrad Lorenz
'What do you get if you cross a gold dog with a telephone? A golden receiver!'
'Happiness is a warm puppy.' Charles M. Schulz
'What do you call a dog magician? A labracadabrador!'
'Dogs’ lives are too short. Their only fault, really.' Agnes Sligh Turnbull
'Dogs have boundless enthusiasm but no sense of shame. I should have a dog as a life coach.' Moby
'What did the dog say to the tree? Bark.'
'The dog is a gentleman; I hope to go to his heaven, not man’s.' Mark Twain
'What’s a dog’s favorite city? New Yorkie!'
'Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.' Roger Caras
'My dog thinks he's a genius. He's convinced that if he stares at the refrigerator long enough, the door will open.'
'Dogs come when they’re called; cats take a message and get back to you later.' Mary Bly
'What kind of dog does Dracula have? A bloodhound!'
'Dogs laugh, but they laugh with their tails.' Max Eastman
'To err is human—to forgive, canine.'
'Dogs leave paw prints on your heart.'
'Why did the dog cross the road? To get to the barking lot!'
'The greatest fear dogs know is the fear that you will not come back when you go out the door without them.' Stanley Coren
'Why was the dog a great musician? Because he had perfect pitch!'
'Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.' Kinky Friedman
'Why did the scarecrow become a successful neurosurgeon? Because he was outstanding in his field. Wait, wrong joke... Because he had the brains for it!'
'The world would be a nicer place if everyone had the ability to love as unconditionally as a dog.' M.K. Clinton
'What kind of dog does a vampire prefer? A bloodhound!'
'Dogs are better than human beings because they know but do not tell.' Emily Dickinson
'What do you get if you cross a dog with a computer? A lot of bites!'
'If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went.' Will Rogers
'Why did the dog join the orchestra? Because he had the best bark-tone!'
'Some of my best leading men have been dogs and horses.' Elizabeth Taylor
'What do you call a cold dog? A chili dog!'
'When you feel lousy, puppy therapy is indicated.' Sara Paretsky
'Why don’t dogs make good dancers? Because they have two left feet!'
'Dogs are how people would be if the important stuff is all that mattered to us.' Ashly Lorenzana
